message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $10000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that is worth more to you than its cost, maximizing your investment and satisfaction. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further.
